authors: Gáspár Nagy,Attila Sztupák,Christoph Seufert,Christian Hassa,Jonas Bandi
description: SpecFlow aims at bridging the communication gap between domain experts and developers by binding business readable behavior specifications to the underlying implementation. Our mission is to provide a pragmatic and frictionless approach to Acceptance Test Driven Development and Behavior Driven Development for .NET projects today.
